UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Isolation, Characterization and Structure Elucidation of a Novel Lantibiotic From Paenibacillus sp.
Literature.Author: Karczewski J, Krasucki SP, Asare-Okai PN, Diehl C, Friedman A, Brown CM, Maezato Y, Streatfield SJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=2-4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=3.4µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium NRBC 100486(MIC=4µg/ml),Bacillus anthracis Ames(MIC=8µg/ml),Bacillus anthracis Sterne(MIC=4µg/ml),Clostridioides difficile VPI 10463(MIC=2µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=0.3µg/ml),Mycobacterium smegmatis ATCC 14468(MIC=4µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=10µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=15µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=125µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 33495(MIC=125µg/ml),Escherichia coli DC0(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli DC2(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Yersinia pestis C092(MIC=16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=10-40µg/ml),Acinetobacter calcoaceticus(MIC=10µg/ml),Acinetobacter ursingii(MIC=10µg/ml),Acinetobacter guillouiae(MIC=20µg/ml),Acinetobacter modestus(MIC=5µg/ml),Acinetobacter septicus(MIC=5µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=10-40µg/ml)
